questions.question: evidence
questions.hint: facts, information, documents, etc. that give reason to believe that something is true

questions.question: diary
questions.hint: a book in which you record your thoughts or feelings or what has happened each day

questions.question: plot
questions.hint: the story of a book, film, play, etc.

questions.question: guest
questions.hint: a person who is staying with you, or a person you have invited to a social occasion, such as a party or a meal

questions.question: resort
questions.hint: a place where many people go for rest, sport, or another stated purpose

questions.question: picnic
questions.hint: an occasion when you have an informal meal of sandwiches, etc. outside, or the food itself
